dmca.title: FW: C17785 - FW: [Fwd: [ABUSE] www.avdvd.net: Infringement of Japan X: DMCA Notice]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Dean Sheldon Serwin [mailto:mail@deanserwin.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, October 19, 2004 2:24 PM
To: 'Legal Response'
Subject: RE: FW: C17785 - FW: [Fwd: [ABUSE] www.avdvd.net: Infringement of
Japan X: DMCA Notice]
Importance: High

DEAN SHELDON SERWIN
ATTORNEY-AT-LAW
mail@deanserwin.com
1680 N. VINE STREET, SUITE 1115                               TEL.323.465.1735
HOLLYWOOD, CALIFORNIA  90028-8837        FAX.323.465.1763

Via Email (abuse@theplanet.com)

September 21, 2004

The Planet.com Internet Services, Inc.
1333 North Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110
Dallas, TX  75207
Attn: Abuse / Peter Pathos

        Re:        DMCA Violation
                Our Client:        IdeaMax - Japan X
                Your Client:        avdvd.net / avcd0.com
                Infringed Titles:        Japanese Super Idols Vols. 4-28;
Tokyo Big Bust Vols.
1-3; Tokyo White Cream Vols. 1-9; Tokyo White Cream Special Vols. 1-2; Tokyo
Gangbang Vols. 1-3; Tokyo Nurses Vols. 1-4; Tokyo Love Story Vols. 1-5;
Tokyo Madam Vols. 1-5; Muranishi Vols. 1-3; Muranishi Collection Vols. 1-3;
Cum Together Vols. 1-3; Japanese Girl Friends Vol. 1; Tokyo Cream Pie Vols.
1-2; Japanese Loose Socks Vol. 1; X-Mode Vols. 1-6; Virtual Sex Vols. 1-2;
East Meets West Vol. 1; Car Sex Vol. 1; Euro Car Sex Vols. 1-2; Euro Wedding
Vol. 1; Euro Castle Vol. 1; Japan X Sampler Vols. 1-4; Japan X Amateur Vol.
1 (and possibly others)

Peter Pathos:

This office is the legal representative of IdeaMax and Japan X (individually
and collectively, "Japan X") the legal copyright owners of the above stated
adult videos, among others (the "Videos").  Japan X is also the sole
distributor of the Videos.

This office is authorized to act on behalf of Japan X in enforcing Japan X's
copyrights.

You are the ISP for www.avdvd.net & www.avcd0.com which has on its web pages
advertisings and links (including free sample videos) marketing the Videos.

Please check the site for the referenced titles.  Considering the number of
pages and that they change as new titles are added, I am unable to point you
to the exact pages, however, I swear under penalty of perjury that I have
just visited the site and found the referenced Videos offered for sale and
previews from the Videos displayed.

My client and this office each has a good faith belief that the use of the
referenced material (the Videos) in the manner complained of is not
authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.

I should further note that my client only sells their products for resale to
authorized dealers and your client is not an authorized dealer.

The information in this notice is accurate, and under penalty of perjury,
and we are authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner.

Sincerely,
s/DEAN SHELDON SERWIN/ (electronic signature)
cc:        Client

-----Original Message-----
From: Legal Response [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com]
Sent: Tuesday, October 19, 2004 12:12 PM
To: mail@deanserwin.com
Subject: RE: FW: C17785 - FW: [Fwd: [ABUSE] www.avdvd.net: Infringement
of Japan X: DMCA Notice]


Please resubmit your DMCA notice referenced in the below-pasted notice to
us. Our department was unable to access it for review. Thanks.

Legal Response Team
The Planet



| -------- Original Message --------
| Subject:         [ABUSE] www.avdvd.net: Infringement of Japan X: DMCA Notice
| Date:         Tue, 21 Sep 2004 18:12:05 -0700
| From:         Dean Sheldon Serwin <mail@deanserwin.com>
| Reply-To:         mail@deanserwin.com
| To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>
|
|
|
|
| Please see the attached DMCA Notice.
|
| This matter requires your immediate attention.
|
| Please excuse the required formality and urgency of this notice,
| however, my client demands that you please immediately do both of the
| following:
|
| 1. Disable access to the individual or company who has engaged in the
| conduct described above, and;
|
| 2. Take appropriate action against the account holder under your Abuse
| Policy/Terms of Service Agreement.
|
| Completeness requires that I should point out the following to you:
|
| 1. The distribution of unauthorized copies of copyrighted motion
| pictures constitutes copyright infringement under the Copyright Act,
| Title 17 United States Code Section 106(3). This conduct may also
| violate the laws of other countries, international law, and/or treaty
| obligations.
|
| 2. Pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, Title 17 United
| States Code Section 512, that we have a good faith belief that use of
| the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the
| copyright owners, their respective agents, or the law.
|
| 3. Copyright law is a strict liability tort and does not require the
| entity committing the infringement, or responsible for the infringement,
| to be aware that their actions are in violation of law. The absence of
| knowledge, or even intent, does not negate the infringement and is not a
| defense.  Contributory copyright infringement requires that the entity
| know, or should have known, that they were inducing, causing or
| materially contributing to the commission of a direct infringement.
| Material or activity which promotes the commission of an  infringement,
| therefore, may constitute contributory infringement.
|
| PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS IS AT LEAST THE SECOND TIME I HAVE A DMCA NOTICE
| REGARDING THIS SITE - THE PRIOR TIME WAS TO EVERYONES INTERNET, AND THEY
| OBVIOUSLY SIMPLY MOVED NEXT DOOR TO YOU.
|
| *****************************
|
| Dean Sheldon Serwin
| The Taft Building
| 1680 N. Vine Street
| Suite 1115
| Hollywood, CA  90028
| 323-465-1735
| 323-465-1763 (fax)
|
| *****************************
|
|
-
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
| ----------------------------
| NOTICE: This email message is for the sole use of the intended
| recipient(s) and may contain confidential and privileged information.
| Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure, or distribution is prohibited.
| If you are not the intended recipient, please contact the sender by
| reply email and destroy all copies of the original message. Thank you.
|
-
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
| ----------------------------
|
|
|
